titleStmt.title: Animadversions upon Iohn Lilburnes two last books, the one intituled Londons liberty in chaines discovered. the other An anatomy of the Lords cruelty. Published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Sheppard, S. (Samuel)
Sheppard, Simon,

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Joseph Pots, and are to be sold at his shop in the Old Bayly neer the Sessions house.,

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Simon Sheppard on the basis of an acrostic found on page 5; in the same acrostic, however, "Simon Shepard" claims to have written The famers fam'd (Wing S3163), which Wing, DNB, etc. attribute to Samuel Sheppard.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in the Old Bayly neer the Sessions house.
